title: nEram mighundadinnum'
sahitya:
nirppaduvE naDappaduvE parappaduvE nIngaLellAm sorppanam tAnA paladOTra mayakkangaLO


anupallavi

  karpaduvE kETpaduvE karuduvadE nIngaLellAm arpa mAyaigaLO ummuL Azhnda poruLillaiyO


caraNam    kANbadellAm maraiyumenrAl maraivadellAm kANbamanrO vIN paDu poyyilE nittam vidhi toDarndiDumO
kANbaduvE urudi kaNDOm kAnbadalAl urudiyillai kANbadu shaktiyAm inda kATSi nittiyamAm
